title: ONGEP - Non-Governmental Organization for Popular Education

home.heroSubtitle: Non-Governmental Organization for Education and Social Projects
home.missionDescription: Promoting education, culture, and social development through projects that transform lives and communities.
home.projectsDescription: Discover the initiatives that are transforming lives and communities.
home.eventsDescription: Check out our schedule of events, workshops, and activities.

home.educationDescription: We promote access to quality education for children and youth in vulnerable situations.
home.communityDescription: We strengthen communities through social projects that promote citizenship and inclusion.
home.solidarityDescription: We encourage a culture of volunteering and donation for important social causes.
